  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AssociativeCommutativeGroup, AssociativeCommutativeSemiRing

    @Beta
public class SumProduct
extends Sum
implements AssociativeCommutativeSemiRing
    Object representing a group on symbolic numbers with addition.
    Author:
    braz

      • multiplicativeAbsorbingElement

        public Expression multiplicativeAbsorbingElement()
        Description copied from interface: AssociativeCommutativeSemiRing
        The multiplicative operation identity element. This reason this is not a test like AssociativeCommutativeGroup.isAdditiveAbsorbingElement(com.sri.ai.expresso.api.Expression) is that semi-rings are required to have a multiplicative absorbing element, but not required to have an additive one.
        Specified by:
        multiplicativeAbsorbingElement in interface AssociativeCommutativeSemiRing

      • getFactors

        public java.util.List<Expression> getFactors(Expression expression)
        Description copied from interface: AssociativeCommutativeSemiRing
        Given an expression, returns its arguments if it is an application of the multiplicative operation, or the expression itself otherwise. This is useful when the multiplicative operator is implicit when applied to a single argument.
        Specified by:
        getFactors in interface AssociativeCommutativeSemiRing
